name: Maynul Islam
comment: Used this in our raised bed vegetable garden. All I can say is...WOW! We have so many vegetables we donâ€™t know what to do with them, so we donated them to neighbors.

name: Shahidul Islam
comment: Good decisions start with good data. Good fertility and nutrient management data start with taking good samples. Book now before it get's too late!

name: Raju Ahmed
comment: Used this last year on four types of tomatoes, two types of peppers, cucumbers and basil. Absolutely loved it and already have some for this year.

name: Kafil Uddin Pramanik
comment: Your service saved our tomato crop! He made our hopeless little garden a fun hobby again!

name: Jalal Miah
comment: A plan that insures nutrients are used agronomically on the crops with minimal erosion, and insures nutrients are not lost from the farmstead.

name: Thomas Shelby
comment: I had some watermelons that I used this on after they had started to grow. They were growing rapidly prior to using this, but when I added this I noticed that they didn't get much bigger. They were barely the size of a grapefruit, the insides were mushy and fairly dry, and then they died soon after.
